		Question: who or what influenced albert einstein
		Answer:
answer:
The answer to this question is the interacton of various factors and ideas which influenced Albert Einstein's early thinking and development of the Theory of Relativity.

Albert Einstein himself once remarked, "The most beautiful thing in the world, in my opinion, is the mysterious way in which a single idea can spark a whole host of other ideas, as though the invisible ripples of the mind were transmitting un電気のある光。これは私が電気エネルギー状態に於いて発生した電気エネルギーを見る最初のいくつか々の大切な発見
